short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 24 2023 at 14:00 EDT.
description: Establish a summer camp for Youth in Ontario for Junior Canadian Rangers training from 21st July to 4th August 2023.
full_summary:
================================================================================================================

# Tender Notice: Junior Canadian Rangers Camp Loon 2023

## Section 1: Tender Details
================================================================================================================

* **Reference Number:** WS3921405029-Doc3923015105
* **Publication Date:** 2023-05-03
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-05-24T14:00:00 EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-07-17
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2023-09-11

## Section 2: Tender Description
================================================================================================================

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites contractors to provide facilities for the Junior Canadian Rangers Camp Loon 2023. The camp will be held from July 21st to August 4th, 2023, and will focus on training in ranger skills, traditional skills, and life skills for youth aged 12-18 from remote and isolated communities in Northern Ontario.

## Section 3: Tender Requirements
================================================================================================================

DND requires access to the contractor's facilities from July 17th to August 11th, 2023, to set up and tear down DND-provided facilities and equipment. Contractors must submit required supporting documentation and bids by May 24th, 2023, at 14:00 EDT. Failure to do so will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

## Section 4: Contract Details
================================================================================================================

* **Contract Category:** Service
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Trade Agreements:** This tender may be subject to various trade agreements, including but not limited to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement.
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (except NCR)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None

## Section 5: Contracting Entity Details
================================================================================================================

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

## Section 6: Contact Information
================================================================================================================

* **Contact Name:** Nadeem Mughal
* **Contact Email:** nadeem.mughal@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
